definition: not to let sb down/to treat sb fairly/be worthy of
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Of the top payroll teams, only the Mavs are getting production equal to the investment.
sentences.chinese: 薪水冊頂端的球隊中，只有小牛的產出對得起投入。

sentences.english: That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
sentences.chinese: 要叫你們行事對得起那召你們進他國得他榮耀的神。

sentences.english: So which deserves your hard-earned cash?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，誰更對得起你的血汗錢呢？

sentences.english: Just ask ourselves whether we really deserve the pay we receive.
sentences.chinese: 捫心自問，我們對得起這份收入嗎？

sentences.english: Do women deserve their reputation for cattiness and backbiting?
sentences.chinese: 這樣的陰險和中傷朋友是否對得起自己的地位？

sentences.english: Little Turtle could only blame himself for oversleeping . He let his good friend down.
sentences.chinese: 怪只怪睡過頭，怎麼對得起好朋友。

sentences.english: For the sake of his ancestors, Old Bi held out, all alone.
sentences.chinese: 爲了對得起祖宗，老畢一直孤獨堅持着。

sentences.english: Jose Mourinho believes he is worth every penny Chelsea Football Club pay him.
sentences.chinese: 穆帥相信他對得起切爾西俱樂部付給他的每一分錢。

sentences.english: When will you be worthy of your million Trotskyites?
sentences.chinese: 你什麼時候纔對得起你那百萬託派分子？

sentences.english: She feels that just being regarded as like this is of equal status, to the identity that must heave our Luo house.
sentences.chinese: 她覺得這樣纔算是門當戶對，對得起我們洛家的身份。

sentences.english: Most importantly, Blueberry Garden is definitely worthy of the prize bestowed upon it.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，她對得起頒給她的大獎。
